name: Wrap'a'Gift
description:
This small game is all about following the rhythm and the indications your helper is showing to help you wrap as many gifts as possible following the beat!

The game unrolls in two phases: in the first one, your helper will show you a succession of arrows in a specific rhythm. In the second phase you have to press the arrows in the same order and rhythm than what the helper showed to you and wrap those gifts!

You can try hitting for the perfect, but it's fine if you can't, any present count! Do your best!

Controls:

  • Arrow keys: move in the menus / wrap the gift in a direction
  • X : Enter in a menu option

Submission for the Pico-8 Advent Calendar Jam 2019. See the other submissions here!
